text: Alicia de Larrocha i de la Calle (May 23, 1923 â€“ September 25, 2009) is an Spanish pianist. She received many Grammy Awards. She performed for 76 years, following which she retired. De Larrocha was born in Barcelona. She died at age 86 after declining health. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Mozart: Piano Concertos Nos. 21 & 23; Piano Sonata "Alla turca (2003) * Schumann: Piano Concerto; Piano Quintet (2005) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Spanish pianists Category:1923 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Spanish Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Barcelona
title: Alicia de Larrocha
